code: import"./SeasonDisplay.css";import React from"react";var seasonConfig={summer:{text:"lets hit the beach!",iconName:"sun"},winter:{text:"Burrr, it's chilly",iconName:"snowflake"}};var getSeason=function getSeason(lat,month){if(month>2&&month<9){return lat>0?"summer":"winter";}else{return lat>0?"winter":"summer";}};var SeasonDisplay=function SeasonDisplay(props){var season=getSeason(props.lat,new Date().getMonth());var _seasonConfig$season=seasonConfig[season],text=_seasonConfig$season.text,iconName=_seasonConfig$season.iconName;return React.createElement("div",{className:"season-display ".concat(season)},React.createElement("i",{className:"icon-left massive ".concat(iconName," icon")}),React.createElement("h1",null,text),React.createElement("i",{className:"icon-right massive ".concat(iconName," icon")}));};export default SeasonDisplay;
